attributes.long-description:
Purchase the Heavy Fire Double Pack to get Heavy Fire: Afghanistan and Heavy Fire: Shattered Spear on PlayStation(r)3.

Both titles are for 1-4 players.

Heavy Fire: Afghanistan:
This super fast playing, high intensity on-rails shooter is set in modern-day Afghanistan. Whether fighting up close and personal with guns and grenades, raining down fire from a helicopter or laying waste with a main battle tank, Heavy Fire: Afghanistan is an immediately fun, pickup-and-play experience for hardcore gamers and novices alike.

Heavy Fire: Shattered Spear
Iran has nuclear weapons and one is sitting on a fully fueled ICBM going through its final launch checklist. Fight your way through Afghanistan, make it over the Iranian border, infiltrate the missile base and permanently stop the countdown in this super fast, high intensity on-rails shooter.



SIXAXIS™ Motion Sensitive
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
